hero.fallback_title: Modern Design & Décor to Make Every Celebration Unforgettable
hero.fallback_subtitle: Family-owned with 15+ years of experience creating elegant weddings, corporate events, and custom floral arrangements.

about.heading: Family-Owned. Passion-Driven.
about.paragraph1: For more than 15 years we've been transforming private and corporate events in Miami with unique floral designs, elegant decor, and a deep passion for crafting unforgettable moments.
about.paragraph2: As a family-owned business, every detail we deliver comes from the heart.

services.heading: Our Services
services.subtitle: From event planning to bespoke floral arrangements, we bring creativity and elegance to every project
services.cta_heading: Ready to Plan Your Perfect Event?
services.cta_description: Let's discuss your vision and create an unforgettable experience together.

gallery_preview.heading: Our Work Speaks for Itself
gallery_preview.subtitle: Explore past events brought to life with intention and artistry

family.title: Family-Owned Business
family.description: Personalized service with a warm, family touch. We treat every event like it's our own.

experience.title: 15+ Years Experience
experience.description: Over a decade of expertise in creating memorable events across Miami.

custom.title: Custom Designs
custom.description: Every event is unique. We create bespoke designs tailored to your vision and style.
